hideTemporaryDescription: This will hide the project. CodexFlow will remember hidden projects. You can enable "Show hidden projects" to view and unhide it.
hideTemporaryDescriptionNamed: CodexFlow will hide "{name}" and remember hidden projects. Enable "Show hidden projects" to view and unhide it.
hiddenProjectBlocked: This project is hidden. Enable "Show hidden projects" to make it visible again.
externalConsoleBlockedDesc: Unable to launch the external {env} console. Check your environment configuration and try again.
externalConsoleBlockedHint: Use the terminal mode switcher in the top bar if you need to change environments.
selectProjectLeft: Select a project on the left
createOneToStart: Or open a project to get started
renameLabelDesc: Only changes the label shown in the list; does not rename the actual folder. Leave empty to clear and revert to the default name.
renameLabelPlaceholder: Leave empty to clear the label
worktreeActionBlockedByTerminals: This action is unavailable because the current project has {count} terminal agent(s) running. Close all terminal agents and try again.
worktreeCreateDisabledChild: This node is already a child; cannot create a worktree (max depth: 1).
worktreeCreateBranchHint: Click: open create panel; Ctrl + Left Click: quick create worktree.
buildRunDialogDesc: After the first setup, it will run immediately. Right-click the button to edit anytime.
worktreeOverrideOn: This command will be saved to the current worktree.
worktreeOverrideOff: Inherits from the parent project by default. Saving will write to the parent project.
worktreeCreateDesc: Each engine instance creates a worktree and starts the corresponding CLI in the console.
worktreeCreateProgressDesc: Shows creation output. You can close this window and reopen it by clicking the branch badge again.
worktreeMetaMissing: No creation record found for this worktree (base/wt branch mapping).
worktreeRecycleDesc: If you hit conflicts or an interrupted operation, resolve it in an external Git tool first.
worktreeRecycleProgressDesc: Shows recycle output in real time. You can close this window; recycling will continue in the background.
worktreeRecycleSquashHint: Squash all commits into one to keep the base branch clean.
worktreeRecycleRebaseHint: Rebase to preserve the original commit history.
worktreeRecycleSquashAfterHint: Tip: You chose Squash. This does not merge the worktree branch commit history into the base branch, so Git may treat it as “not merged” when deleting the branch and require a force delete (this will not affect the merged changes).
worktreeRecycleStashInfo: Saved base worktree changes to stash: {msg} {sha}
worktreeRecycleSuggestedRestore: After the base worktree is back to a normal state, you can run: {cmd}
worktreeRecycleError_BASE_WORKTREE_IN_PR: The base worktree has an in-progress Git operation or conflict files. Please finish/abort it in an external tool, then retry.
worktreeRecycleError_BASE_WORKTREE_LOCKE: The repository is locked (e.g. index.lock or another Git process is running). Close the process and retry.
worktreeRecycleError_BASE_WORKTREE_STASH: Failed to auto-stash the base worktree. Please check the Git state in an external tool and handle it manually.
worktreeRecycleError_BASE_WORKTREE_DIRTY: A stash was created, but the base worktree is still not clean (e.g. submodules/nested repos that stash cannot cover). Please handle it in an external tool.
worktreeRecycleError_WORKTREE_DIRTY: This worktree has uncommitted changes. Please commit/stash or discard them before recycling.
worktreeRecycleError_RECYCLE_FAILED: Recycle failed. Please inspect conflicts/interrupted operations/hooks in an external tool, fix them, then retry.
worktreeRecycleError_RECYCLE_FAILED_STAS: Recycle failed. To avoid applying your base worktree changes on top of a conflicted/interrupted state, we did not auto-restore the stash. Fix the recycle failure in an external tool, then restore manually.
worktreeRecycleWarning_BASE_WORKTREE_RES: Tip: Recycle completed, but restoring the base worktree caused conflicts. Resolve conflicts in an external tool. The stash is kept: {msg} {sha}

Tip: Recycle completed, but restoring the base worktree failed. The stash is kept: {msg} {sha}
You can run: {cmd}
worktreeRecycleWarning_BASE_WORKTREE_STA: Tip: Recycle completed and restoration was attempted, but dropping the stash failed. You can delete it later: {sha}
worktreeRecycleBaseDirtyDesc: Recycling runs checkout/merge operations on the base worktree. Uncommitted changes were detected; choose an option:
worktreeRecycleBaseDirtyBody:
Continuing will do:
- Create a "transaction snapshot" to preserve the base worktree's 3-state (staged/unstaged/untracked):
  - Run `git stash push -u` to snapshot working tree content (includes untracked; excludes ignored).
  - Byte-back up `.git/index` to restore staged semantics exactly.
- Auto-restore after recycle: normalize to a clean state, then replay the working tree snapshot by overwrite (no merge), restore the index snapshot, and verify fingerprints.
- If restore/verify fails: the stash/snapshot are kept; use an external Git tool to handle it manually.
worktreeDeleteAfterRecycleTitle: Merge back succeeded. Delete this worktree?
worktreeDeleteDesc: Runs git worktree remove and deletes the dedicated branch for this worktree.
worktreeDeleteForceRemoveHint: Uncommitted changes detected: force removal will discard them.
worktreeDeleteForceBranchHint: Branch not merged: force deletion will lose commits on that branch.
worktreeDeleteBlockedByRecycling: This worktree is being recycled; deletion is temporarily disabled. Click “Recycle” to view progress.
worktreeDeleteInProgress: This worktree is being deleted. Please do not repeat the action.
gitActionFailedHint: Handle conflicts/interrupted operations/hooks in an external Git tool, then retry.
ctxOpenGitTerminal: Open in external terminal / Git Bash
gitOpenTerminal: Open in external terminal / Git Bash
